exceptions.tactic: intros m x y H1 H2 H3 H4.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) <-> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
eqc = fix eqc (m : fmap) (x y : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x = x0 /\ y = x0 \/ eqc m0 x y | L m0 _ x0 y0 => eqc m0 x y \/ eqc m0 x x0 /\ eqc m0 y0 y \/ eqc m0 x y0 /\ eqc m0 x0 y end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
planar = fun m : fmap => genus m = 0 : fmap -> Prop
planarity_criterion_RCP_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
weak_planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m < -> planar (L m zero x y)
expf_planar_rcp_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m
expf_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar (L m zero x y)
planarity_criterion_RCP_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
weak_planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m < -> planar (L m one x y)
not_eqc_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m zero x y)
expf_planar_rcp_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m
expf_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar (L m one x y)
not_eqc_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m one x y)
not_eqc_planar : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m k x y -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m k x y)
eqc_cA_1_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m (cA_1 m k x) y -> eqc m x y
eqc_eqc_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k y)
eqc_eqc_cF : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cF m y)
eqc_cA_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x (cA m k y) -> eqc m x y
eqc_eqc_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x y -> eqc m x (cA m k y)
expf_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m x y -> eqc m x y
eqc_trans : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y z -> eqc m x z
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
eqc_symm : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y x
eqc_exd_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> exd m x /\ exd m y
A_1_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y
eqc_cA_1_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA_1 m k x)
planar_I : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_I m x -> planar (I m x t p)
plf = fix plf (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 _ _ _ => plf m0 | L m0 zero x y => plf m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 (cA_1 m0 one x) y) | L m0 one x y => plf m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 x (cA m0 zero y)) end : fmap -> Prop
eqc_cA_r : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc m x (cA m k x)
plf_planar : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> plf m -> planar m
Euler_Poincare : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> planar m -> ec m / 2 = nc m
expf_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), {expf m x y} + {~ expf m x y}
eqc_refl : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), exd m x -> eqc m x x
cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
eqc_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), {eqc m x y} + {~ eqc m x y}
cA_cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
McA0.exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA_1 m Md0.k z)
McA1.exd_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA_1 m Md1.k z)
succf = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => pred m zero z /\ pred m one (A_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> Prop
cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA_1 m k z)

```  
intros m x y H1 H2 H3 H4.
split.
- intros H5.
  apply (planarity_criterion_RCP_0 m x y H1 H2 H3 H4).
  intro H6.
  apply H5.
  left.
  exact H6.
- intros [H5|H5].
  + apply (weak_planarity_criterion_0 m x y H1 H2 H5 H3).
  + apply not_eqc_planar_0.
    exact H1.
    exact H2.
    exact H3.
    exact H5.
```
